mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART_ITEM (CART_ITEM_CODE, MEMBERIDX, PRODUCTCODE, QUANTITY, PRICE, CREATED, CART_OPTION) VALUES (seq_CART_ITEM.NEXTVAL, #{memberIdx}, #{productCode}, #{quantity}, #{price}, SYSDATE, #{cartOption})
mapper.select: SELECT CART_ITEM_CODE AS cartItemCode, MEMBERIDX AS memberIdx, p.ITEM, p.DISCOUNT, c.PRODUCTCODE AS productCode, QUANTITY, p.PRICE, CREATED, CART_OPTION AS cartOption FROM CART_ITEM c LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.PRODUCTCODE = c.PRODUCTCODE WHERE MEMBERIDX = #{memberIdx}
